sprint_goal: Establish the core calculator functionality and the complete user authentication lifecycle (register, login) to unblock all dependent features.
Implement foundational user data persistence for history and variables, and deliver the first specialized electronics mode (Ohm's Law).
Deliver the end-to-end user-extensible functionality by implementing the custom mode creation wizard and the secure execution engine. Complete the 555 Timer mode.
Harden the application by implementing full offline capability, ensuring WCAG 2.1 AA compliance, and delivering critical GDPR/CCPA data export functionality.
